flixel.system.FlxVersion

type
class
Helper object for semantic versioning.

Constructor

new(Major : Int, Minor : Int, Patch : Int, ?PatchVersion : String)

Instance Variables

major(default,null) : Int

minor(default,null) : Int

patch(default,null) : Int

patchVersion(default,null) : String

Instance Methods

toString() : String

Formats the version in the format "HaxeFlixel MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH-PATCH_VERSION", e.g. HaxeFlixel 3.0.4
